Bash(AIRTABLE_API_KEY="pat0mFLRND851TtmB.7adcc56ec8295e6dee3e9ccb650be44af930efa1b8d4bcd5f51bea160340c8db" AIRTABLE_BASE_ID="appR8MwS1pQs7Bnga" python3 -c "
import os
import requests

api_key = os.getenv(''AIRTABLE_API_KEY'')
base_id = os.getenv(''AIRTABLE_BASE_ID'')

print(''ğŸ” Checking Airtable base structure...'')
print(f''ğŸ”‘ API Key: {api_key[:15]}...'')
print(f''ğŸ“Š Base ID: {base_id}'')

# Try to get base metadata
url = f''https://api.airtable.com/v0/meta/bases/{base_id}/tables''
headers = {''Authorization'': f''Bearer {api_key}''}

try:
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    print(f''ğŸ“¡ API Response Status: {response.status_code}'')
    
    if response.status_code == 200:
        data = response.json()
        tables = data.get(''tables'', [])
        print(f''âœ… Found {len(tables)} tables in base:'')
        for table in tables:
            print(f''  ğŸ“‹ {table[""name""]} (ID: {table[""id""]})'')
    else:
        print(f''âŒ API Error: {response.status_code}'')
        print(f''ğŸ“„ Response: {response.text}'')
        
except Exception as e:
    print(f''âŒ Request failed: {e}'')
")

")

Bash(AIRTABLE_API_KEY="pat0mFLRND851TtmB.7adcc56ec8295e6dee3e9ccb650be44af930efa1b8d4bcd5f51bea160340c8db" AIRTABLE_BASE_ID="appR8MwS1pQs7Bnga" python3 -c "
import os
import requests

api_key = os.getenv(''AIRTABLE_API_KEY'')
base_id = os.getenv(''AIRTABLE_BASE_ID'')

print(''ğŸ” Getting detailed table schema...'')

url = f''https://api.airtable.com/v0/meta/bases/{base_id}/tables''
headers = {''Authorization'': f''Bearer {api_key}''}

try:
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    data = response.json()
    
    # Find the Funding Opportunities table
    for table in data.get(''tables'', []):
        if table[''name''] == ''Funding Opportunities'':
            print(f''ğŸ“‹ Table: {table[""name""]}'')
            print(''ğŸ” Fields in this table:'')
            for field in table.get(''fields'', []):
                print(f''  â€¢ {field[""name""]} ({field[""type""]})'')
            break
    else:
        print(''âŒ Funding Opportunities table not found'')
        
except Exception as e:
    print(f''âŒ Failed to get schema: {e}'')
")
